name: Speedball Toss Arcade Machine in Amusement Blitz Carnival Park
name_original: Speedball Toss Arcade Machine in Amusement Blitz Carnival Park
description:
Welcome to the Amusement Carnival Park! We have just introduced our new Speedball Toss Machines! Step inside and prepare to be amused!

The Speedball Toss Arcade Machine is a super addictive arcade machine game. Get as many points as you can - and when you get good enough, take your game online to compete with your friends!

Enjoy! Try This Game For FREE Now!
